description: Table containing data about Alternators with Start/Stop function (starters/alternators, or BSG, belt starter-generator) which can be tested ny MS005A test bench

columns.name: Make
columns.description: The Make column contains multiple makes in a single string (e.g., 'VW AUDI PORSCHE'). When filtering, do not compare with equality. Instead, use string matching methods such as .str.contains() (case-insensitive) to check if the target make is present in the string.

columns.name: OEM Number
columns.description: This column represents the list of corresponding OEM numbers of original manufacturer

columns.name: MSG Article
columns.description: This column represents the MSG Article of the alternator

columns.name: Model
columns.description: This column represents the model of the compatible vehiche for this alternator

columns.name: Motor
columns.description: This column represents the motor type of the compatible vehiche model for this alternator

columns.name: Manufacturer
columns.description: This column represents the manufacturer name for this alternator

columns.name: In stock in RND department
columns.description: This column represents the amount of this alternators in stock in RnD department

columns.name: Testing with MS005A
columns.description: This column represents if it is possible to test this alternator with MS005A. 'Yes' means already can, 'No' means Not yet, Empty field means I've never seen such alternator, 'No, Not compatible' means that this alternator can never been tested my MS005A, 'Yes, Only in alternator mode' means that we can test it only like alternator, not in starter mode because of immobilizer protection feature

columns.name: Cable for MS005A
columns.description: This column represents the compatible cable for this alternator

columns.name: Voltage, V
columns.description: This columns represents the nominal voltage for this alternator

columns.name: Current, A
columns.description: This columns represents the nominal current for this alternator

columns.name: Protocol
columns.description: This columns represents the type of protocol for this alternator
